history.proof: intros n x1 x2 H. induction n. - simpl. auto. - simpl. rewrite IHn. auto. sfirstorder depth: 3.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (n : nat) (x1 x2 : nat -> nat), (forall z : nat, z < n -> x1 z = x2 z) -> prod n x1 = prod n x2

Premises:
prod = fun (n : nat) (x : nat -> nat) => nat_rec (fun _ : nat => nat) 1 (fun n0 Hrecn : nat => x n0 * Hrecn) n : nat -> (nat -> nat) -> nat Arguments prod _%nat_scope _%function_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
prodBig1 : forall (n : nat) (x : nat -> nat), (forall z : nat, z < n -> x z > 0) -> prod n x > 0
chineseRemainderTheoremHelp : forall x1 x2 : nat, CoPrime x1 x2 -> forall (a b : nat) (pa : a < x1) (pb : b < x2), a <= b -> {y : nat | y < x1 * x2 /\ a = snd (proj1_sig (modulo x1 (ltgt1 a x1 pa) y)) /\ b = snd (proj1_sig (modulo x2 (ltgt1 b x2 pb) y))}
chineseRemainderTheorem : forall x1 x2 : nat, CoPrime x1 x2 -> forall (a b : nat) (pa : a < x1) (pb : b < x2), {y : nat | y < x1 * x2 /\ a = snd (proj1_sig (modulo x1 (ltgt1 a x1 pa) y)) /\ b = snd (proj1_sig (modulo x2 (ltgt1 b x2 pb) y))}
Nat.rs_rs' : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, A z -> (forall n : nat, z <= n -> A n -> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, z <= n -> (forall m : nat, z <= m -> m < n -> A m) -> A n
Nat.right_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, A z -> (forall n : nat, z <= n -> A n -> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, z <= n -> A n
Nat.left_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, A z -> (forall n : nat, n < z -> A (S n) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, n <= z -> A n
Nat.ls_ls' : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, A z -> (forall n : nat, n < z -> A (S n) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, n <= z -> (forall m : nat, m <= z -> S n <= m -> A m) -> A n
Nat.order_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, A z -> (forall n : nat, z <= n -> A n -> A (S n)) -> (forall n : nat, n < z -> A (S n) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, A n
Nat.strong_left_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, (forall n : nat, n <= z -> (forall m : nat, m <= z -> S n <= m -> A m) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, n <= z -> A n
Nat.left_induction' : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, (forall n : nat, z <= n -> A n) -> (forall n : nat, n < z -> A (S n) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, A n
Nat.lt_exists_pred : forall z n : nat, z < n -> exists k : nat, n = S k /\ z <= k
Nat.lt_stepl : forall x y z : nat, x < y -> x = z -> z < y
Nat.lt_stepr : forall x y z : nat, x < y -> y = z -> x < z
factorial = fun n : nat => prod n S : nat -> nat Arguments factorial _%nat_scope
Nat.Rgt_wd : forall z : nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq iff)) (fun n m : nat => m < n <= z)
Nat.Rlt_wd : forall z : nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq iff)) (fun n m : nat => z <= n < m)
Fin.t_ind : forall P : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P (S n) Fin.F1) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t -> P (S n) (Fin.FS t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t
lt_wf_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> Prop), (forall n0 : nat, (forall m : nat, m < n0 -> P m) -> P n0) -> P n
Nat.log2_bits_unique : forall a n : nat, Nat.testbit a n = true -> (forall m : nat, n < m -> Nat.testbit a m = false) -> Nat.log2 a = n
nat_rec : forall P : nat -> Set, P 0 -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0 -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
Nat.order_induction_0 : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, 0 <= n -> A n -> A (S n)) -> (forall n : nat, n < 0 -> A (S n) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, A n
Nat.induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A n -> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
Nat.case_analysis : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
String.index_correct4 : forall (n : nat) (s : String.string), String.index n String.EmptyString s = None -> String.length s < n

```coq
intros n x1 x2 H.
induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite IHn. auto.
Qed.
```
